comments:
I get the following stack traces occasionally when I use "Run Ant..." to execute
a build file (last seen running a build.xml generated by PDE for one of my
plugins).  When this happens, the console output stops updating

Using Build id: 200212131041


org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable

The console support is provided generically by the debug platform.

It was possible for a pending link to be added to a document while pending 
links were being processed (due to different threads). Added synchronization 
in "addPendingLinks()" and "checkOverflow()".

Fixed.

I made the synchronization in checkOverflow use the monitor on fPendingLinks
Verified code.
